import { useLocation, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' import "./TrainingFeedback.css" import Axios from 'axios' function FormManagement(){ const location = useLocation() const { full_name } = location.state let { id } = useParams() const [tema, setTema] = useState("") const [speakerFb, setSpeakerFb] = useState("") const [raport, setRaport] = useState(0) const handleFeedback = () => { console.log("click") console.log(tema, speakerFb, raport) Axios.post(`http://localhost:3001/api/training/${entitate}/${id}`, { tema: tema, speaker: speakerFb, raport: raport, }).then(response => console.log(response)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) alert("Multumim de feedback!") } return(
